data.name: Atlas Landing Gear
data.description: Designed, manufactured and validated integrity of landing gear for a fixed-wing VTOL aircraft, implementing nosewheel steering and coil/leaf spring suspension systems, achieving a 20% (300 grams) reduction in system weight.

data.name: Artemis Push Propeller Mount
data.description: Designed and performed FEA on horizontal propeller motor mounts that resisted deformation under varying loading conditions and achieved an 80% weight reduction (200 grams) of the previous design.

data.name: Gas Engine
data.description: Led the transition of aircraft from an electric motor to a 60cc gas engine, effectively doubling horizontal flight time while maintaining the same system weight. Conducted vibration and drain tests to ensure stability and performance.

data.name: Atlas WEbay
data.description: Developed and produced WEBay, an electrical bay flush to wing holding multiple accessible batteries, reducing manufacturing time by 70% and achieving an expedited two-month deadline from the five-month standard.

data.name: MAE 2250 Phone Case
data.description: Discovered a niche in the market with a multifunctional phone case. It features the ability to stand both horizontally and vertically, includes a card holder, and has a twisting component that can make the case either smooth or grippy.

data.name: Mercedes AMG Car CAD
data.description: Worked on modelling the body of a Mercedes AMG as accurately as possible to learn more about different features in the SOLIDWORKS CAD software. Planning on making car remote control.

data.name: RC Plane Research and CAD
data.description: Designed and 3D printed a personal UAS plane. Currently working on V2, incorporating the knowledge gained from the first version.

data.name: Digital Fabrication Documentation
data.description: A four-credit course I took while a high school student that integrates computer science, art and design. Learned skills from 3D printing to programming electronics.
